bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Budget Transparency and Accountability Act.

bcl:part.bcl:text: Government Organizations in the Taxpayer-Supported Government Reporting Entity

bcl:section.bcl:text: The standards and guidelines referred to in section 23.1 (1) (a) of the Act that apply to the government as reported through the consolidated revenue fund are adopted for government organizations in the taxpayer-supported government reporting entity.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Section 2 applies to a government organization in the taxpayer-supported government reporting entity, other than an education and health sector organization, in relation to

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the fiscal year of the organization beginning in 2011, and

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Section 2 applies to an education and health sector organization in relation to

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the fiscal year of the organization beginning in 2012, and
